summary: A group of teenagers in Colorado find themselves being stalked and killed one by one by a mysterious figure with a hook, exactly one year after they covered up a friend's accidental death.
cast: Brooke Nevin|David Paetkau|Torrey DeVitto|Ben Easter|Seth Packard|K.C. Clyde|Clayton Taylor|Michael Flynn|Britt Leary|Star LaPoint|Junior Richard|Levy Whitlock|Chad Chiniquy|Manny Slack|James Jamison|Brett Yoder|Don Shanks|Sally Ann Brooks|Daniel Drysdale|Brad Hardin|Barrett Ogden|Eliza Wren
title: Siempre sabré lo que hicisteis el último verano
